title: The Folly of Teaching, from "In Praise of Folly"
marks: Signature and Edition LLC, in the plate: [EICHENBERG]; below image, in p
description: printed in black; man holding a switch and a picture of Adam and Eve, yelling at gathered children in LRC; monk spanking a child\'s bare bottom with a knotted rope at L; demon figures at R; child kneeling before a man at a lectern who holds one child by the ear and another by the hair; children wearing dunce caps in upper corners; received framed
creditline: Gift of John and Susan Lentz
